title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: Why is there too much flashing in the Control Example?
OB: The entire outermost frame is being repainted instead of just the bottom edge.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted to reduce unnecessary flashing.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Perform actions that trigger repaints.
3. Observe if the entire outermost frame or only the bottom edge is being repainted.
